attributes.action: Ensure local authorities grit public footpaths in cold weather
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister to ensure local authorities devote sufficient  resources to ensuring there are adequate stockpiles of salt/grit to treat all public footpaths used in residential neighbourhoods in frosty weather conditions, in order to minimise injury to pedestrians (especially the elderly) through slippage and falls.
